title: Push Notifications
content:
6-8pm: The Highest Engagement

Average weekday push notification activity in North America.
  • The data is normalized by local hour)
  • The blue line / The left axis: Raw number of sends.
  • The Red line / The right axis: Raw number of opens.
  • Source: Andrew Chen's Research Note

Key Take Aways

  • 60% of users opt-out of push notifications
  • A small peak around noon
  • A slightly larger peak around 3pm
  • The largest peak in the evening
  • Pushes Opened starts to trend higher after 6pm
